## Source: amazon-inspector (c53c7a0c82b0a316878dbbd5767381ca0ef874192a308eb5001b953915dc816b)
The package oe-oauth was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (e75cae4824473b93438bf6a60c72ea18ad66368c8213af6bec6126171dead86e)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'oe-oauth' @ 99.99.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
